chunks.text: Learning the concept of inline and block elements in HTML is very important.
chunks.title: Inline & Block Elements in HTML

chunks.text: Inline elements are those which take only this much width as required.
chunks.title: Inline & Block Elements in HTML

chunks.text: And block elements are those which take the full width of the screen.
chunks.title: Inline & Block Elements in HTML

chunks.text: This is also called display property which can be set through CSS.
chunks.title: Inline & Block Elements in HTML
